title: Ticket #5922: Improve linux distro detection
description:
The cmake build code detects the linux distro by looking at /etc/redhat-release (if it exists) and /etc/issue. Admins can and do change /etc/issue, and the default contents may not contain the distro name. Both of these can break the build, or alter it in ways we don't immediately notice.

We should change the cmake build scripts to ignore /etc/issue and instead use files with more reliable contents. On distros that use systemd, /etc/os-release looks to be the best option.
